website_summaries.verdict: The Beats Solo3 Wireless headphones use Apple's W1 chip for easier connectivity with iOS devices and deliver a balanced Bluetooth audio experience for bass lovers, but feel a tad expensive.
pros: Apple W1 chip enhances experience with iOS devices
Detachable cable with inline remote for passive listening
cons: Headband can get uncomfortable during longer listening sessions

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like how they feel. Matte gold colour is really nice compare to other colours Sound is great and easy to use Perfect for the gym
customer_reviews.author: Linda T.

customer_reviews.title: Simply incredible quality.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality in terms of build and sound. Really have exceeded anything I've purchased before - previously used Bose headphones but these are a different level. Battery life is as advertised and pairing with an iPhone or other Apple product is 2 steps. Best price I found for these was on Amazon by a distance, and only added to the overall quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: So impressed by my sons set, that I bought these! Very comfortable to wear for extended periods of time. No real noise leakage. Great to use in the gym. Expensive but well worth the investment
customer_reviews.author: Mrs H

customer_reviews.title: Big Beats
customer_reviews.text: So far, I'm enjoying the sound of the Solo3's, having most tested with post-rock, metal and hip hop. Pairs super easy with the iPhone, and I would recommend playing with the internal EQ of the phone if you're tying them together. However, once tweaked, the sound is big and cosy. I have Jaybirds for running, which are fabulous, but these do feel more all-encompassing. I wouldn't say I'm an audiophile, but I can't stand wearing tinny headphones with poor range in them. If it handles my three genres fine, then I'm more than happy. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: A. Everitt

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sound and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sound and very comfortable, good strong bluetooth being able to walk from room to room without carrying your phone or tablet, very happy
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Kelsall

customer_reviews.title: Dreadful!
customer_reviews.text: The noise leakage on these is awful. Even just watching a movie people can hear every word, I dread to think what it would be like for music! I really expect better quality for £149.99. Returning for a refund and will purchase some Sonys instead.
customer_reviews.author: Sports Fan

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan for me. Sound was ok, but nothing special. Well made and packaged. Good for about town, but no good for gym as keep slipping off. Controls on them are very poor. Overall there very very expensive for what they are.
customer_reviews.author: Mr BJA

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I’ve had but see issues above
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic but issues with one of the ear pads... cover coming off. I would have given 5 stars but this is most annoying and now coming away on other ear
customer_reviews.author: david hattam

customer_reviews.title: Dreadful battery life.
customer_reviews.text: I have two pairs of these - this being the 2nd pair (in black) to accompany my (grey) Beats which are used for the gym. I bought these for casual use but the battery life is absolutely useless - I listen to them once straight after charging and fine but leave the phones turned off for 24 hours and when I next try to turn them on, the battery is dead. Really annoyed. My old pair continues to have a fantastic battery life.
customer_reviews.author: C M Young

customer_reviews.title: Right ear stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Sound only comes out one side - this happened suddenly and within 6 months of purchase. I don't mind that Beats aren't as good sound quality or whatever as other headphones, overpriced etc etc. They are extremely comfortable, the sound is decent enough but after 4 months one ear just suddenly broke. 1 star because they broke so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Brook

customer_reviews.title: Fakes
customer_reviews.text: They were painful to wear, and I had my doubts about the sound quality. I went to Apple to see if they were genuine beats and they said they were very good fakes. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of beats when they first came out and 6 years later they are still going strong, just a bit tatty now. Bought these as I wanted wireless for work. Absolutely love them, never had a problem. Great for the gym as well! Can pick up calls with them! Brilliant ! Only thing is I find that they do stratch quite easily. My friend who bikes to work found out they turn off if it is below 0 degrees as a safety feature so good to know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beats solo 3 headphones
customer_reviews.text: Really like these headphones! I've wanted a pair of beats for ages but was sceptical of purchasing them due to the price but they work well and the colour is vivid. They come with a case which is cool. They hurt ears after time but that's to be expected. I like the fact they are wireless and connect so simply.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa zieba

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I wanted a long battery life and the ability to take calls - And the caller to be able to hear me in train stations, etc, where there is a deal of background noise and boy do these deliver... 40 hours max between charges and you can really get this, plus I can make and receive calls in train stations and places with a lot of noise... True, there are better headphones for pure sound if what you want is to listen to music, but as I needed some TRUE all-rounders I tried these and have been really pleased with the results... Had them for a few months now and they are as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Leighton

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality is OK. Better headphones out there for this price.
customer_reviews.text: As the headline says, it's ok. Bluetooth works well with iPhone and quick to recharge. Could last upto 2 weeks with single charge, but there are much better headphones out there. My wife wanted design and looks over sound, so couldn't convince her to get better headphones. Bose QC35 and B&W P7 or Sony XM3 (it just came out) would be one of my choices.
customer_reviews.author: Biv

customer_reviews.text: My boy loves these so much that he never takes them off. The battery lasts for ever and the fold up real neat. Arrived quickly, items is well built and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Lod A

customer_reviews.title: Broke exactly after a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in April 2010 and the bluetooth stopped working all of a sudden. Just wouldn't connect and I use these moderately so not even daily. Due to corona virus and the postal service not working properly (I posted 5 days ago with Royal mail tracked 48hrs) this means it will probably take months to get them back or if they decide to give me a new pair..so annoying, in particular when I use them for meetings and to work.
customer_reviews.author: Jas

customer_reviews.title: THANK YOU AMAZON!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the headphones last minute for an Italy delivery and I couldn’t believe it when it arrived before Christmas, what a lovely surprise. The product itself is absolutely fantastic, as a Bose fan this was the first time I buy something different and am really pleased I did, the sound quality is next to none and it feels very comfortable on too. I absolutely Love it. A new Beats fan here ;D
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Nice Headphones, good looks and sound quality
customer_reviews.text: A good set of headphones bought as a gift for my daughter, so the aesthetics had to be good for a start. I've also tested against my own set of Bose QC35's and the sound quality is actually not bad in comparison for uncomplicated Pop music (but these are not noise cancelling. Recently bought, so can't comment on the longevity yet, but they seem sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Gary G

customer_reviews.title: awesome sound!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound, great quality, 40 hours of battery is PERFECT! You don’t have to be recharging every 4 hours... BEAUTIFUL color, amazed me. I’ve got one negative thing to say: makes my ears sweat a lot while exercising, and I need to keep cleaning ‘em. Sometimes it moves out of my gear a little...This is the ONLY issue. I LOVE THEM ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Fabs

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are comfortable, easy to use and have a fantastic range. I left my phone charging in one room (with the music app playing) and walked to another room and the headphones still continued to play. I was completely surprised (but in a good way). The battery lasts ages and since purchasing I've only charged the headphones twice.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Monster xxxx

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in August. They are nice looking and comfortable. The folding feature makes them easy to carry back and forth to work and use on the train. However, the ear pieces fell apart after just 5 months use. Bear in mind, my last headphones of this type and style lasted 15 years. The leather starts peeling away from the plastic and the foam underneath is exposed. I have highlighted this with Apple under their one-year warranty and they have agreed to fix them at no charge. If you search on the Internet this appears to be a common design fault with these headphones. I am very worried whether these will last one year, let alone 15 years.
customer_reviews.author: A M Davis

customer_reviews.title: Warehouse bargain gone wrong
customer_reviews.text: I had these headphones originally then lost them. Needless to say I was devastated. Purchased them again on Amazon warehouse to save a few pennies, they wouldn’t work unless plugged into power source. Upgraded to Studio version again another dud arrived minus charging cable. No problem I have these cables around the house. They neither charged up or paired to my phone. Converting to Sony. Disappointing considering the warehouse idea works for some saving money but for me, nada.
customer_reviews.author: marblegardens

customer_reviews.title: Epic quality but not soundproof to other people
customer_reviews.text: I really like these, epic sound quality and easily beats the Airpods that i bought these to replace, i bought it in a sale where it was £100 off the price, and they work seamlessly with my Iphone 7plus, however, to people around me when i am listening to songs, they can hear too, even at half volume, which makes it hard to be subtle in quiet places and means people can hear me when im listening to nikki minaj :/
customer_reviews.author: Joe Cook

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sound leakage.
customer_reviews.text: I searched endlessly on the internet for headphone reviews to come to a conclusion on which brand to buy and I chose these. I love the headphones and the sound quality is great but there is an overwhelming amount of sound leakage which I didn’t expect at all. I didn’t see anyone mention it and I am so disappointed with it. You can’t go out with the headphones on because it’s embarrassing. Even on the lowest sound volume you can hear everything outside of the headphones and for this reason I am sending them back. For the price these headphones are I expect them to not have such a huge manufacturing fault.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love these, so easy to connect and the sound is great. Battery life is good and an option to connect a wire to c9nserve battery life if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality, only last for 1 year , CRAP!!
customer_reviews.text: The headphone is alright for the first year, but it stopped working not long after the warranty expired- couldnt charge it anymore, couldnt turn on and basically unusable. Contacted the customer service and the coat to get the headphone checked and fixed is the cost of buying a new one. What a shame for Beat to produce something that only last for the warranty period. Will not purchase Beat again.
customer_reviews.author: Guillaume

customer_reviews.title: Best OverEar Headphones I’ve Had!
customer_reviews.text: REALLY GOOD!! Okay so I listen to music a lot through out my daily routine. Whether its at gym twice a day for 2 hours each session or on my break at work during a 10 hour shift. I got my beats with me. Quality is perfect. Blocks out what going on around me, staff in canteen being loud or even out on the train/busses in London. Completely disregards whats going on around you, just becareful when crossing roads lol!! & Works well for gaming as I use them to play fortnite at times or even watching movies on my PC. Really good headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good sound comfort could be better
customer_reviews.text: Try good at noise insulation, as with all beats these are naturally very bass heavy so I recommend adjusting the frequencies by lowering the bass or otherwise to your preference. Battery lasts for ages when fully charged connects like a dream to apple products. Only criticism is as these are the on-ear versions it can get a little uncomfortable after a longer while a shame really as otherwise a premium pair of cans
customer_reviews.author: LL Cool Jaz

customer_reviews.title: never miss a beat with this battery life
customer_reviews.text: easy to connect, battery lasts forever, are super comfortable to wear for extended periods of time, and the audio is more than good enough to my elf ears. fold up into a cute protective case to cart around with me. i take em everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Lexxi

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and have good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend on the Amazon Prime Day as he’d wanted a pair for a while now. He uses them every day on his commute to work and wears them to the gym. These are good for the gym as they are wireless. They are stylish and we got them at a good price. Very happy. Considering getting myself a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: These really are an excellent set of headphones. Worth that extra bit of money. Nearly got a pair of Sony for about £40 cheaper - but pleased I stuck with these. You can really get immersed in the sound with these. Really comfy on the ears. Makes music sound so much better - particularly if like me you usually just listen to music on an Alexa speaker or in the car.. Very popular make with my children too.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my wife. Amazing sound quality! She loved it. Very quick pairing with iphone 6s, and the built doesnt look cheap even if its made of plastic so a must for someone looking for fashion headsets. And the battery life is soooo long! I cant even remember the last time we charged it. Definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Avoid these. Poor quality product and amazon customer service
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a Christmas present for my son. Power failed after 4 months and had to return to be fixed. Two months later and they’ve not been returned. Have got a refund. This has been a painful experience. Despite enquiring 4 weeks ago as to where my repair was, I still had to chase again. At this point I was told I should have escalated earlier, which I had if they had checked my account properly. At best Amazon customer services was poor on this occasion. Long story short, I’ll never buy Beats again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cross

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, if expensive, pair of headphones. Quality sound and volume, and the battery life is exceptional. Additionally certain part can be replaced when worn, which increases the versatility and longevity of the product and counter balances/offsets the initial purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply excellent
customer_reviews.text: I know these headphones are pretty expensive BUT for me this has been one of the best purchases I have made. They are brilliant, the sound quality is out of this world and the noise cancellation is absolutely excellent. They feel premium and so comfortable on the ears.
customer_reviews.author: Jimski

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I love love love them. I use them everyday. The sound is great and are fantastic when listening to a heavy base song. They connect automatically (once paired) when they’re switched on. Comfortable padding which is easy to clean with anti-bacterial wipes (I use them for the gym a lot). Battery is good. Like I said I use them everyday day and I can last 3/4 days without charging them. One thing to note is that after long period of use they tend to get uncomfortable on the top of my head and on my ears though this may not happen to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gessica A

customer_reviews.title: Highest volume could be higher
customer_reviews.text: The quality, battery life, controllers and look of it are great but the sound quality is not what I would expect from Beats. The highest volume is not that high. Especially during the commute, it doesn't block the sound very well. The Jubilee Line's weird noise is more powerful than them. Update: The headphones started to chip from the sides. Recently bought noice-cancelling Sennheisers by paying £60 less and can’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Very good but could be brilliant
customer_reviews.text: What is missing in this wireless headphones is has not music changer buttons just volume control and play/pouse buttons on headphones itself which may be very annoying when you would like to skip a song while you exercise or running, cleaning or cooking either and many for this amount of money it should be in there like in many other cheaper brands do have so Beats I hope you will change it in next gen. sound it self with proper equalizer settings is stunning battery life long enaught.
customer_reviews.author: Mateusz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound, wish they were more durable.
customer_reviews.text: For over-ear headphones, these sound really fantastic. The volume can be load enough to drown out noise on planes etc, and there's not too much bleed. It's a shame, however, that they're not more durable. I bought these to replace an earlier model (which I also loved) which broke, but sadly these ones have also stopped working after get knocked about slightly.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and great price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely over the moon with my new beats, I’ve always been a big fan of the earphones and had the first solo ones and decided it was time for an upgrade. They arrived quickly with signed and tracked delivery and were well packaged, the quality is amazing and the colours are even better in person they are really comfortable and spongey soft.
customer_reviews.author: Pixie

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love these, purchased 4 for the girls.. only down side does hurt a little when wearing glasses.. Use them for conference calls and work... great stuff
customer_reviews.author: Cookra

customer_reviews.title: They hold charge really well
customer_reviews.text: Charge lasts for ages, Uber simple to set up, comfortable, light and sound is reasonable. Daughter really likes them, a lot. They are however overpriced and are more suited to Apple fan boy than music lover. So depending on why your are buying try them out first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magnificent.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant headphones the best one I ever had. Top quality. Fast delivery due to my Amazon Prime. Price great. Just what I needed for the gym. The sound is just outstanding. Noise Cancelling is great, volume control is cool. The sound quality is utterly amazing so clear and crisp A*****
customer_reviews.author: Fitness 4

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Second attempt at buying these Beats headphones. Once again, I find the build quality is absolutely rubbish. Despite only using them at weekends and keeping them in their protective case throughout, the picture you see is the result of less than a years worth of wear and tear. When you're paying this amount for what I'm certain used to be a respected brand, you expect a certain level of quality, which sadly these are lacking. So If you're looking for professional yet durable headphones for the real working environment, DO NOT PURCHASE THESE.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne C McDonald

customer_reviews.title: diapointed
customer_reviews.text: for the hype and price - i was expecting better Im glad Airpods are out now
customer_reviews.author: JAMES RUDD

customer_reviews.title: Wife loving it
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my wife and she's loving it. The design is pretty cool, it's super easy to connect to the iPhone, the battery last A LOT, and sound quality is really good. The only cons is that it doesn't come with noise cancelling, but that was a known thing when buying the headphones and there are no headphones of this ear size with noise cancelling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love them
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about these headphones. They’re absolutely amazing I absolutely love them. They’ve got a good range so I can dance around the house while leaving my iPhone playing the music in the kitchen, I can dance all around the house it’s great
customer_reviews.author: C Kent

customer_reviews.title: 1 year and 3 months later: kaput
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of beats solo 3, after the first one got stolen after only a year. Now I know, that's about how long they last in any case. Although I really enjoyed them for the year, for the price point they're at: it's simply not worth it. I now have hardware issues and have just about fallen out of the warranty time frame.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Schulte

customer_reviews.title: Really good!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these to take for long walks and it was the right purchase. The sound is amazing and battery lasts hours! If you are wearing glasses and not able to take them of while listening to music on these, they may press to much on your ears and after couple hours may be painful. Battery charges really fast, the design is amazing. Overall it was great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The beats solo 3 were Purchased 0n the 28-11-18 they lasted till 22-12-19 then the right hand side stopped working , this Seems to be a common issue with Beats solo 3 just check out YouTube only 12mth guarantee / warranty inclued total waste of money and total crap backup sevice by apple i would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: smally

customer_reviews.title: Look cool, great battery, otherwise average
customer_reviews.text: Look great and like the fit. The battery life is also fantastic! But the sound is nothing special and bleeds out a lot so people next to you can get a listen too. Also after a while they hurt your ears quicker than my previous cheaper pair but I guess that’s the price you pay for the snug fit. I bought these for my partner and they like them and i borrow now and again but wouldn’t spend the money for my own pair.
customer_reviews.author: Leo1991

customer_reviews.title: Blue Tooth Makes Kids Do Other Things
customer_reviews.text: These were our first blue tooth for our children. Great battery life, great sound quality. V easy for kids to connect to Apple iPads. Also, a great ‘pause’ button for parents in the ear! The thing we didn’t realise is that, as opposed to wired earphones, the kids soon get bored but now start to do other things. So they will walk off an start colouring in. Missing pen? No problem, leave the iPad and wander off listening to it to get it. Glue, scissors - again totally mobile. We limit time but are not technophobes but we’re amazed at the difference compared to wired.
customer_reviews.author: Discerning Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly bad sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Had these earphones for 6 months now, used them all the time however, I knew there was something wrong with them and it wasn’t until the other day I used someone else’s I realised mine were well and truly shocking bad. I think it was ignorance the fact they were ‘dre Beats’ I left them so long knowing they were bad as if the speakers were blown
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I have EVER bought
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are so good. I use them on the train to work, shopping and revising in school. They are good at getting rid of the noise in the background. They are also very comfy on my ears and side of my head. The battery life is incredible too and you can go a considerable distance from the device you are connected to and the music still plays.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product as a gift to my girlfriend as she wanted some new headphones. these are amazing. she loves them as they are comfy for long use, have great sound quality and have great noise cancellation. i would highly recommend these for a gift or personal use
customer_reviews.author: shaun carey

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my husband for christmas after him bugging me for the last year for a pair and i have to say i have never seen him so happy constantly saying how much he loves them and how fantastic they are uses them every day and was about 3 weeks before he had to re-charge them the charge lasts forever and the sound quality is just amazing. Happy husband means happy wife would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: These sound amazing . I highly recommend .
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with these . They sound amazing and are really loud should you need that . They also last forever on 1 charge . How long they’ll last remains to be seen as I’ve read some reviews which comment on their lack of reliability but so far I’ve absolutely no complaints .
customer_reviews.author: Steabb

customer_reviews.title: Good Looks - Average Sound - Terrible Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: The headphones have a sleek minimal design but don't sound great in comparison with similar priced headsets. The material durability has been terrible. Besides maximum care, the padding on both earpieces has fallen apart in less than 6 months and now the right speaker completely stopped working. Check out the competition if you're looking for a durable option.
customer_reviews.author: Tommaso Guidotti

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the flexibility of the headphones, can fold up in my bag which is great..they look beautiful as well. The sound is good! Just not as bass-y as anticipated..the sound cancellation is good too..but when the sound is up a considerable amount..over all I am happy with the headphones definitely! But if you want more bass I wouldn’t buy these..they are more for the ‘casual’ music listener like me.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Everything is perfect with beats
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is insane, I went and did 1 week without charging and that's me listening to music a lot. It does get warm when you wear it too long and can lead to headaches. Colour is great and comes with its own bag, charger and aux cord. simple click to the left side for pause and skip music, also great for calls. Very stylish as well.
customer_reviews.author: Abdul Mohib

customer_reviews.title: Run on magic
customer_reviews.text: Excellent battery life, I charge them regularly but they don’t seem to ever actually need charging. Light wearing and sound pretty much the same as most other expensive headphones.
customer_reviews.author: JSM

customer_reviews.title: Design and sound stage on point
customer_reviews.text: Look great not too bulky. Soundstage suits my listening preference. Controls need more time to get used to which is frustrating at times so not intuitive like other products I own
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. A. Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great. The headset doesn’t have a noise cancelation feature but the pads offer a nice muffle. However after one hour or two of use they start feeling heavy on you head. Also, impossible to use with earings, if you are considering them for office use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall the product is really good and sound excellent but I did have a problem with part of the head band coming apart . Disappointing really as I thought for the money I had paid . The quality would have been better ! Amazon great full refund issued
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my 14 yo daughter
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had been asking for these for ages and ages.. Decided to finally buy them for her. Great quality, arrived undamaged. Even comes with a case, which is awesome. Gave a 4 star for the durability, as she has only had them for just under a month, so can't really comment on the durability at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Handy. Bluetooth n voice commands r cool. Good bass n treble mix. Far better than using ordinary head phones. Above all, looks cool n brings pride of the brand .
customer_reviews.author: Elson Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Great and even better if on offer!
customer_reviews.text: I like these headphones a great deal. They are not noise cancelling only noise isolating. They pair really easily with my Apple products but the software doesn’t appear to allow you to adjust EQ. Sound quality suits me and I bought them to replace a pair of AKG headphones. Battery life is good too. Would I buy again? Yes but only if on sale as the full price of nearly £250 is a bit steep.
customer_reviews.author: Ships Doctor

customer_reviews.title: If you like quality sound, these are the headphones to go for
customer_reviews.text: I can’t find a single negative aspect about these headphones. Incredible sound even at maximum volume. Feels like you’re wearing wee portable subwoofers! More than happy with this ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones, I love the colour and the sound quality, I have earphones from Beats already and I would not use any other brand. They last ages and are great
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about these beats! Colour exactly matched my gold iPhone 8 and it’s more of a dusky pink/rose than gold. They are so comfortable to wear and the sound is excellent. Husband has the wireless Bose ones and the sound of these beats is better in my opinion. Not noise reducing which is the only criticism but then they don’t claim to be - The Bose ones are. Battery life lasts ages. I wear them every day to and from work and when I go for a run and I hardly have to charge them. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Reeds

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were on our daughters Christmas list. Was a bit dubious paying that amount for headphones but we got them on offer on Black Friday. She loves them. They cancel out noise well and seem pretty durable. They also come with a case which they fit into perfectly. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Quality brand..
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant headphones, brought for my son as a Christmas present which he was very happy with. Love the style and colour, sound is amazing. The charge is super fast and last for a very long time- around 40 hrs I believe. Fast delivery just before Christmas... one happy mommy.
customer_reviews.author: Kezza Hawks

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound & great battery life
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound & great battery life. I have removed a star because 4 months after purchase the battery began to drain persistently even when the headphones were turned off. This meant I had to recharge the headphones every couple of days even though they had only been in use for a few hours. Great service from Amazon who sent out a replacement pair which are working as intended.
customer_reviews.author: BlueCactus

customer_reviews.title: Gutted
customer_reviews.text: Only just got round to using these headphone I ordered a wile back due to me being away and the Bluetooth stopped working and can only be used now with the aux cable I got them sent out to Afghanistan as I was serving away and was really looking forward to them but a massive massive disappointment I have spoken directly to beats and they said to contact amazon absolutely gutted
customer_reviews.author: Tyler jordan mullins

customer_reviews.title: Great buy great colour
customer_reviews.text: Brought as gift, good price compared to some stores and great delivery, she loved them and has used them all the time in the gym and is still very happy with them would buy myself a pair for sure
customer_reviews.author: lucy

customer_reviews.title: BROKE TWICE IN 12 MONTHS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: FIRST BROKE JUST 4 MONTHS AFTER FIRST USE, REPLACED BY AMAZON, SECOND PAIR ONLY LASTED 2 MONTHS. BOTH HAD THE SAME ISSUE- ONLY LEFT HEADPHONE WORKING :( Amazon was very helpful and refunded me full amount.
customer_reviews.author: MarkZ

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in mid November 2018 and now just after the warranty expires they stopped working in the left headphone. This seems to be a common problem so they are badly made and expensive for a headphone which breaks just after one year. Do not buy!! Now trying to obtain a cost free repair or replacement from Amazon otherwise will complain and take back to Apple. Amazon have come to the rescue by offering me a refund for which I am grateful.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Fell to pieces after a few months. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I loved these... for the few months that they worked! After about 6 months of normal use they started falling to bits. The ear muff completely came off and fell apart for no reason. Now Amazon have refused to repair them... and I'm left with headphones I can't use and no recourse. DO NOT BUY unless you want a pretty-looking, very expensive set of headphones that fall apart in a few months. Totally regret not buying Sony or something else.
customer_reviews.author: John Riley

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: Really good but like the sound leakage is so bad it’s unreal, sit next to me when I’ve got them on and you may aswell be listening to the song too
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves them!
customer_reviews.text: From start to finish, the delivery was quick from ordering them to being delivered. My daughter has got them today and is in love with them, in her words sic! The sound is excellent, she has wanted them for ages! They are an early Christmas present. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Dani Piacenti

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound quality, Very good battery, very poor mic
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful battery and very powerful sound quality. Very cheque and beautiful colours. Very powerful Bluetooth cover But I had some issues: - Using it for couple of months, the lining material is starting to crack up a bit. - Very poor quality mic (very quiet and catch all the background noise) - Very poor aireation for ears (you will feel very dumped and very hot ears quickly)
customer_reviews.author: amr

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. I can’t wear buds as I find them very painful. I’m pleased with these headphones, I can wear them for an hour without problems, even with glasses. They can get a bit painful after that, but I can only wear buds for 5 minutes without pain. For what I need the sound quality is good, they sync perfectly to my iPhone and make calls when out and about simple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Superb quality Headphones by Beats. Bought as a Xmas present and the recipient is over the moon. Great price too compared to the High Street.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Anthony D

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Never bought a nice headset before and I was blown away by how good these Beats are! Work so flawlessly I have zero complaints! Great for hitting the gym or just going for a walk with a podcast on.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the headphones for a Xmas present. Never switched off so we had to charge them every night and they constantly disconnected from devices randomly. Put up with it until April when they final broke completely. Tried resetting them. No luck. Complete waste of money. Struggling to get in touch with Amazon to sort a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, just wish that they were used for ps4 as you cannot use the mic when playing ps4 , I’ve used them for running for 6 months and stay on your head well, sound is great also has 360 sound. Battery is insane how long it lasts. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amanda F.

customer_reviews.title: Not very loud
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good, look the business, battery life is great. I have them on full volume and they’re not that loud. That said, no headphones I have ever tried are loud enough for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Walker

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the sound.
customer_reviews.text: I simply love them especially because I can only hear with one ear. For me, they are just right! Because I bought them in this colour they are a bit picky. I forgot when I last charged them! I couldn't wait until Christmas so I decided to buy them earlier. I buy when I feel!😊
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: They was smaller than I expected and the noise cancellation is very poor. Also if you have your music playing above quarter volume everyone can hear it word by word. But is a nice small portable headset.
customer_reviews.author: Finlay

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones! Sound is very nice for music and movies. Noise cancellation is very good. Just ears might get tired after using them for a very long time
customer_reviews.author: Saule

customer_reviews.title: 5* product
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I have owned. Can’t hear anything when you’ve got these on. So comfortable, I use them in the gym and at home.
customer_reviews.author: LMART

customer_reviews.title: Ear foam pieces didn't last.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are fine in themselves. The foam earpieces are poor quality and Amazon / their repair centre can't repair them under warranty, so they are refunding after nine months, rather than replace or repair the item.
customer_reviews.author: Gaars

customer_reviews.title: More of a fashion statement but still very good
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace the ear cups after a year but they look nice and sound nice. These are more of a fashion statement though. I just use them to play PlayStation
customer_reviews.author: Kaleba K.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love these very comfortable very easy to connect charges pretty quick high quality for the value of them would be better if the ear pieces was bigger so people sat near you can’t hear what your listening too they are very nice love the colour too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: It's super difficult to figure out where the volume buttons are on the headphones without quickly searching it. Finally found them and adjusted my review accordingly
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and great value.
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves these! Uses them in the gym, working from/to work/gym, walking the dogs. A lot more comfy than having ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Davis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sound is clear
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my sister and she had great feedback. Delivery was quick and arrived the next day ready for her 21st birthday surprise. Headphones are great quality, comfortable and the sound is great, very clear. Uses for the gym mainly and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Quality genuine headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter she absolutely loves them. Great quality and sound. Before this I bought the same pair from Argos and after several days they stopped working had to return them and found these, so I was hesitant to purchase here but no regrets she has had them for awhile and they are still working great.
customer_reviews.author: MissJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant sound, syncs beautifully with Mac air and iPhones, great battery life... definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Katie

product_meta.title: Beats Solo3 Wireless On-Ear Headphones - Apple W1 Headphone Chip, Class 1 Bluetooth, 40 Hours Of Listening Time - Gloss Black (Previous Model)
feature_bullets: High-performance wireless Bluetooth headphones in gloss black
Features the Apple W1 chip and Class 1 wireless Bluetooth connectivity
With up to 40 hours of battery life, Beats Solo3 wireless is your perfect everyday headphone
Compatible with iOS and Android devices
With Fast Fuel, 5 minutes of charging gives you 3 hours of playback when battery is low
Adjustable fit with comfort-cushioned ear cups made for everyday use
Sleek, streamlined design that’s durable and foldable to go everywhere you do
Take calls, control your music, and activate Siri with the multifunction on-ear controls
The award-winning sound and design you’ve come to love from Beats, with premium playback with fine-tuned acoustics that maximize clarity, breadth, and balance
What's in the box: Beats Solo3 Wireless headphones, carrying case, 3.5mm RemoteTalk cable, Universal USB charging cable (USB-A to USB Micro-B), Quick Start Guide and Warranty Card
